New York Metro Area Postal Union Records

New York Federation of Post Office Clerks Newsletter: officer lists, sports quiz submissions, postal press association award certificates, federation credit union, interview with 1st Local 10 President Albert Rossdale, Audit Committee Reports: hospital plan, Constitution and Bylaws; Election Materials, Tax and Financial Records 1943-1959
